channel.name: Astro Rania MY
channel.title: Naik Ranjang
channel.desc: After being separated for 20 years, Tyas tries to find her father, Mahdi, to be the guardian of her marriage to Gino. After meeting Mahdi, Tyas' fiance, Gino is shocked to find Hani, Tyas' sister who has a child from their past relationship. Gino plans to get rid of Hani to hide his secret in order to smoothen his marriage with Tyas.
